ssot__EmailEngagement__dlm.name: Email Engagement
ssot__EmailEngagement__dlm.description: The Email Engagement DMO represents data captured from various sources about engagement in the email channel.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to account contact.

ssot__ActionCadenceStepId__c.description: A reference ID to action cadence step.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to a recorded issue, for example laptop connectivity.

ssot__CityName__c.description: The city of recipient derived from IP address at time of engagement event.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to accounts’ contact point, for example physical address, email address, or phone number.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: A reference ID to country of recipient derived from IP address at time of engagement event.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceCountryId__c.description: A reference ID to the country where device is located.

ssot__DeviceLatitude__c.description: The Geo latitude of the device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceLocaleId__c.description: A reference ID to user locale configured on device.

ssot__DeviceLongitude__c.description: The Geo longitude of the device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DevicePostalCode__c.description: The postal code associated with device.

ssot__EmailDomainName__c.description: The subset of email address that represents domain after @ sign.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Email Engagement DMO.

ssot__EmailFromAddr__c.description: The email address of sender profile associated with email at time of send.

ssot__EmailFromName__c.description: The sender profile name associated with email at time of send.

ssot__EmailName__c.description: The email message name associated at time of send.

ssot__EngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement channel action.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementDateTm__c.description: The date and time of engagement. Engagement records result from activities occurring later than the send, so Engagement Date Time must be later than Send Date Time.

ssot__EngagementEventDirectionId__c.description: The engagement event direction where values are Inbound or Outbound.

ssot__EngagementNotesTxt__c.description: The details about what transpired during engagement.

ssot__EngagementNbr__c.description: A user-facing ID that isn’t automatically set using auto-number.

ssot__EngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID to background process that generates volumes of email messages, SMS messages, or other Engagement Vehicle types. Publications can be specific to Engagement Channel Actions.

ssot__EngagementTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement, for example email or phone.

ssot__EngagementVehicleId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement vehicle.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to contact for account.

ssot__InternalEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement actor that groups the different types of individuals targeted for marketing engagements, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsTestSend__c.description: A flag to indicate if an engagement record was generated as part of testing.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadlId__c.description: A reference ID to person or company that showed interest in products.

ssot__LinkURL__c.description: The link where software application or web page accessed, generated the engagement.

ssot__MarketAudienceId__c.description: A reference ID to the intended audience that engagement was designed to reach.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityId__c.description: A reference ID to step or activity that customer configures in Salesforce Journey Builder tool for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketSegmentId__c.description: A reference ID to group of people who share one or more common characteristics, and are grouped for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketingEmailListId__c.description: A reference ID to the marketing email list used for the engagement.

ssot__Referrer__c.description: The name of a generic marketing method that generated user engagement, for example a campaign or search advertisement. For example, a campaign or search advertisement.

ssot__ReferrerURL__c.description: The URL of application that directed user to the software application that generated engagement.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: An internal document generated by seller indicating that customer is ready to purchase products and services.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID to how consent is checked, for example Transactional such as placing an order implies opt-in for an order confirmation email or a commercial promotional email requiring opt-in

ssot__SentDateTm__c.description: The date and time of send.

ssot__SessionId__c.description: A reference ID to session used to group related events together.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID to the shopping cart for data captured from user actions, for example adding or removing items from shopping cart.

ssot__StateProvinceId__c.description: A reference ID to the state of recipient derived from IP address at time of engagement event.

ssot__StateProvinceTxt__c.description: A reference ID to the state/province code of recipient derived from IP address at time of engagement event.

ssot__SubjectLineTxt__c.description: The associated email subject line at the time of send.

ssot__TargetEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to engagement actor that groups different types of individuals targeted for marketing associated with engagement, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__TaskId__c.description: A reference ID to business activity, for example making a phone call. In the user interface, tasks and event records are collectively referred to as activities.

ssot__WebCookieId__c.description: A reference ID to a small piece of data sent from website and stored on user's computer by user's web browser while user is browsing.

ssot__WorkflowId__c.description: A reference ID to a sequence of steps or processes in software application where a piece of work passes from initiation to completion.
